first_translate: I think we’re far enough away now.
yes.

hangle: 황태자 전하께서도 사람이 많으니 어쩌지 못하실 거예요.
first_translate: the crown prince won’t bother you here since there are so many people around him right now.
then...
let me introduce myself properly.
my name is livia priscilla.
oh my goodness...!
it’s nice to meet you! I’m lady fiona haelion.

hangle: 사교계에서 피오나 영애를 뵙는 건 처음이네요.
first_translate: this is actually the first time that I’ve seen you at any events like this before.
that's because I've been living out in the countryside all these years.
today was my first ball ever.
hmm... haelyn...

hangle: 정말 많은 분들의 호기심을 자극하는 곳이죠.
first_translate: a lot of people seem curious about your family.
is that so...?

hangle: 어쨌든 도움을 받았으니 보답을 하고 싶네요.
first_translate: well anyway, thank you for helping us earlier.
ah,

hangle: 조만간 가문에서 작은 티 파티를 열 예정인데,
first_translate: my family will soon be hosting a small tea party,
and I’d love it if you could join us as our guest.
pardon? a tea party?
livia priscilla?! she wants me to come to her famous tea party?!

hangle: 무릇 귀족 영애라면 초대받고 싶어 선망한다는 그곳?!
first_translate: every single noblewoman dreams of being invited to one of those parties!!!
it may not exactly count as repaying you back or anything,

hangle: 피오나 영애가 하루빨리 사교계에 적응하는 데 도움이 될 거예요.
first_translate: but attending the event would help you get used to life in high society more quickly.
if you put it that way...
I gladly accept your invitation then.
no, please don’t mention it.

hangle: 후에 헤일론 저택으로 정식 초대장을 보낼게요.
first_translate: I’ll send over a formal invitation later on.
alright...
whoa!

hangle: 어쩌다 보니 리비아랑 친분을 쌓게 되었네.
first_translate: somehow, I ended up becoming friends with livia today.

hangle: 이거 또 원작이랑 달라지는 것 같은데, 괜찮을까…
first_translate: wait, does this mean things aren’t going according to how they did in the original story anymore? what am I supposed to do--
all of them were arrogant little brats!
livia priscilla...

hangle: 아름다운 외모에 가문도 든든해서 마음에 들었다.
first_translate: not only is she beautiful, but she also comes from a powerful family. I really like her.

hangle: 내 옆자리에 있을 여자로 완벽하지 않은가.
first_translate: doesn’t she sound perfect as someone by my side?

hangle: 줄곧 중립을 지켰던 프리실라 가문이 내 편이 되면,
first_translate: on top of that, having house priscilla on my side when they have always remained neutral until now...

hangle: 내 위치도 더욱 확고해질 게 분명하고!
first_translate: ...will definitely solidify my position even further!

hangle: 황태자비가 될 수 있으니 저에게도 나쁜 조건이 아닌데,
first_translate: I can become the next crown princess too, which isn’t such a bad deal either.
yet why has she continued to reject me?

hangle: 제국에서 아버지를 제외하곤 내가 가장 고귀한 사람이건만!
first_translate: I'm the most important person in the entire empire after father!
hmph!
fine, let’s go chase after her again...
ooh.
what was her name again? ah yes, fiona haelion.
now that I take another look at her, she seems quite pretty.

hangle: 수도에서는 보기 드문 은발에, 선명한 붉은 색 눈동자도 좋고.
first_translate: her silver hair is rare to see in the capital, and her bright red eyes suit her well.
she looks frail, which makes me want to protect her.

hangle: 게다가, 헤일론 공작이 결혼한 기억은 없으니…
first_translate: moreover, duke haelion never married anyone...
that must make her his illegitimate child.

hangle: 그렇다면 다소 가지고 놀아도 큰 뒤탈은 없겠지!!
first_translate: in that case, playing with her shouldn’t cause much trouble!
fiona haelion...
crown prince’s delusion
please don’t leave me behind!
hmph!
I played along despite knowing she wasn’t worthy of me, yet she still dares to act difficult toward me.
you know, she doesn’t seem half-bad.
your highness.
why are you standing here?
gosh, you scared me just now...
were you looking at something interesting?

hangle: 이 형님에게 인사도 없이 말을 걸다니.
first_translate: are you talking to me without greeting me first?
do bastards lack basic manners?
answer me!

hangle: 내가 이런 녀석의 눈치를 아주 잠시나마 봤다니.
first_translate: to think I wasted some of my precious time trying to win over a lowly bastard like you.
right, didn’t you say you came from haeleon territory?

hangle: 그럼 저 여자에 관해 아는 게 있겠군.
first_translate: then you probably know something about that woman.

hangle: 저 은발에 붉은 눈을 한 여자 말이다.
first_translate: I’m referring to the girl with silver hair and red eyes.
I’m not sure where you’re getting at with that question though.
since she’s fairly pretty,
I thought maybe I'd keep her company for a bit.
I haven’t had much fun lately.
there’s no point answering such a pathetic reason.
excuse me?
how dare you talk to me like that!

hangle: 감히 황태자인 이 형님에게 무슨 말버릇이냐!!
first_translate: I’m the future emperor of this land, you insolent brat!
try harder than that, brother.
argh...!
th-that damn bastard...!
th-that damn bastard...!
can you let go of me?!
am I already up next?
w-wait,
wh-what are you doing--?
kegh!
klegh...
hrng...
let me warn you.
I couldn’t care less whether you sit on the throne...
...or remain as the crown prince forever.
u-ugh...
there’s only one thing...
...that I desire in this world.
but...
urgh
if you lay a finger on her,
regardless of who you are...
...and whatever power you possess,
I promise to kill you slowly and painfully.
get that straight into your head, big brother.
